short.am,ar,bn,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,fa,: 🔫 Real-time 1v1 battles that test your shooting and building skills.
short.bg: 🔫 Битки 1 срещу 1 в реално време, които тестват вашите умения за стрелба и изграждане.
short.ca: 🔫 Batalles 1v1 en temps real que posen a prova les teves habilitats de tir i construcció.
short.cs: 🔫 Bitvy 1v1 v reálném čase, které otestují vaše střelecké a stavitelské schopnosti.
short.da: 🔫 Real-time 1v1-kampe, der tester dine skyde- og byggefærdigheder.
short.de: 🔫 1v1-Kämpfe in Echtzeit, die deine Schieß- und Baufähigkeiten auf die Probe stellen.
short.el: 🔫 Μάχες 1v1 σε πραγματικό χρόνο που δοκιμάζουν τις δεξιότητές σας στη σκοποβολή και την οικοδόμηση.
short.es: 🔫 Batallas 1 contra 1 en tiempo real que ponen a prueba tus habilidades de tiro y construcción.
short.et: 🔫 Reaalajas 1v1 lahingud, mis panevad proovile teie laske- ja ehitusoskused.
short.fi: 🔫 Reaaliaikaiset 1v1-taistelut, jotka testaavat ammunta- ja rakennustaitosi.
short.fil: 🔫 Mga real-time na 1v1 na laban na sumusubok sa iyong mga kasanayan sa pagbaril at pagbuo.
short.fr: 🔫 Des batailles 1v1 en temps réel qui testent vos compétences de tir et de construction.
short.he: 🔫 קרבות 1 נגד 1 בזמן אמת שבוחנים את כישורי הירי והבנייה שלך.
short.hi: 🔫 वास्तविक समय 1v1 लड़ाइयाँ जो आपकी शूटिंग और निर्माण कौशल का परीक्षण करती हैं।
short.hr: 🔫 Bitke 1 na 1 u stvarnom vremenu koje testiraju vaše vještine pucanja i građenja.
short.hu: 🔫 Valós idejű 1v1 csaták, amelyek próbára teszik lövöldözős és építőkészségeidet.
short.id: 🔫 Pertarungan 1v1 waktu nyata yang menguji keterampilan menembak dan membangun Anda.
short.it: 🔫 Battaglie 1v1 in tempo reale che mettono alla prova le tue abilità di tiro e di costruzione.
short.ja: 🔫 射撃と建築のスキルをテストするリアルタイムの 1 対 1 の戦い。
short.ko: 🔫 사격 및 건설 기술을 테스트하는 실시간 1v1 전투.

short.lv: 🔫 Reāllaika 1 pret 1 cīņas, kas pārbauda jūsu šaušanas un veidošanas prasmes.
short.ms: 🔫 Pertempuran 1v1 masa nyata yang menguji kemahiran menembak dan membina anda.
short.nl: 🔫 Realtime 1v1-gevechten die je schiet- en bouwvaardigheden testen.
short.no: 🔫 Sanntids 1v1-kamper som tester skyte- og byggeferdighetene dine.
short.pl: 🔫 Bitwy 1 na 1 w czasie rzeczywistym, które sprawdzają Twoje umiejętności strzelania i budowania.
short.ro: 🔫 Bătălii 1v1 în timp real care vă testează abilitățile de tragere și de construire.
short.ru: 🔫 Бои 1 на 1 в реальном времени, в которых проверятся ваши навыки стрельбы и строительства.

short.sl: 🔫 Bitke 1 proti 1 v realnem času, ki preizkušajo vaše sposobnosti streljanja in gradnje.
short.sr: 🔫 1 на 1 битке у реалном времену које тестирају ваше вештине пуцања и грађења.
short.sv: 🔫 Realtids 1v1-strider som testar dina skjut- och byggfärdigheter.
short.th: battles การต่อสู้ 1v1 แบบเรียลไทม์ที่ทดสอบทักษะการยิงและการสร้างของคุณ

short.uk: 🔫 Битви 1 на 1 у реальному часі, які перевіряють ваші навички стрільби та будівництва.
short.vi: 🔫 Trận chiến 1v1 thời gian thực kiểm tra kỹ năng bắn súng và xây dựng của bạn.
short.zh_CN: 🔫 实时 1v1 战斗，测试您的射击和建造技能。
short.zh_TW: 🔫 即時 1v1 戰鬥，測試您的射擊和建造技能。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bring the excitement of competitive gaming directly into your browser with 1v1.LOL! This Chrome extension lets you jump straight into fast-paced 1v1 battles, build defenses, and face off against other players anytime, anywhere. Whether you’re a shooter fan or new to building mechanics, 1v1.LOL offers a thrilling experience that’s perfect for quick matches or extended gameplay sessions.

🔫 What 1v1.LOL Does:
1v1.LOL is an action-packed game that combines shooting and building mechanics, allowing players to duel opponents in real-time. Choose from multiple modes, including Battle Royale, Box Fight, and the classic 1v1 Duel, and test your skills with friends or players around the world.

🌟 Why Install 1v1.LOL:
Quick Access: Play directly from your Chrome browser with one click—no installations or downloads required!
Real-Time Battles: Face off in thrilling 1v1 duels where only the best shooter and builder wins.
Play More Games: Access the "Play More Games" menu at the top-left corner to explore more exciting games without leaving your browser!
Customizable Controls: Adjust settings to suit your playstyle and maximize your performance.
Challenge Friends & Players Worldwide: Compete online and test your skills against top players.
🏆 Ready for Battle?
Install 1v1.LOL and prepare to build, shoot, and strategize your way to victory! With multiple modes and endless challenges, 1v1.LOL will keep you coming back for more competitive fun.

👉 Install 1v1.LOL today and dominate the battlefield!

Play more games on the top-left menu.
